trait.name: Unusual Nature
entries: The skeleton doesn't require air, food, drink, or sleep.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The skeleton makes two greataxe attacks.

action.name: Greataxe
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 9} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}25 ({@damage 3d12 + 6}) slashing damage.

action.name: Freezing Stare
entries: The skeleton targets one creature it can see within 60 feet of it. The target must succeed on a {@dc 13} Constitution saving throw or take 35 ({@damage 10d6}) cold damage and be {@condition paralyzed} until the end of its next turn.
